coded_answer.p: First of all I would like to thank you for the good programme you organisedhave organised for our trip to London. EspeciallyIn particular the sightseeing by busThe sightseeing by bus, in particular, seems to be very interesting.

But we would like to suggest you somethingsuggest something to you: Therethere is a trendy event about the latest fashions, leisure and sports wear;, make upmake-up and hairstyles, on the 14th of March. It is called ,,"The London Fashion and Leisure Show." This would be a great opportunity for us because we are all intrestedinterested in clothes, sports and fashion. I have almost forgottenalmost forgot to mention that it is free for students! Unfortunately we realisednoticedhave noticed that on the 14th we will already visitare already visiting the Science Museum. The show lasts nine hours, from 10.00-19.00, the whole day! Our question now is: Couldcould we go to this show? We could maybe change Tuesday's programme to Wednesday. We all preferwould all prefer to go to the show,; free time is not so important for us.
Please think about this and give us an answer. Thanks.

Thanks a lot for your letter. I am fine but quite busy because I have my German exams. Therefore I read Agatha Christie's ,,"Best Detective Stories of Agatha Christie". I can really recommend you this bookrecommend this book to you, it. It is fabulous. It is also a suitable present for your cousin, I think. One story is about ten personspeople who stay together in a hotel on a lonely island. There is a storm and they can notcannot leave. Suddenly a murderermurder happenstakes place! Believe me, you would never guess who the killer is! There is also Hercule Poirot, the famous detective, and he finally solves the misterymystery. But I will not tell you any more. You have to read it yourself. And if your cousin likes crime stories it is a perfect book!
Unfortunately it is quite expensive, Â£32. But do not worry about the price because your cousin will love it!
Okay, I hope to have news from you very soon. Have a good time.
